title: Which song gets you energised in the morning? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a few songs that I love to start my day with. Choosing among them depends on my mood and how I want my day to be spent. Here is the list. Motivation: There are days when I have !important meetings or have to appear for something that's going to change the course of my life. So to start my day on a positive note I listen to “The best day of my life” by American Authors. Listening to this song instantly makes me motivated and makes me believe that I have all the power to achieve whatever I wish for. Moreover this song has a kind of tune that would make you jump out of bed and fill you with a go-get-it feeling! This is gonna be the best day of my life, My li-i-i-i-i-ifeGratitude: My day starts with a short Thank You speech to the almighty for giving me another day to look forward to and experience new things. And the song that goes with it is “I'm Alive” by Celine Dion. When you bless the day, I just drift away. All my worries die. I'm glad that I'm alive!Self Worth: Value and respect from others come when you value and respect yourself. And nothing is better than the song “Stay beautiful” by Taylor Swift which makes me feel one in a million. You're beautiful. Every little piece, love. And don't you know, You're really gonna be someone, Ask anyone.Lazy Sundays: On sundays I love to listen to “A Sunday kind of love”. This is a jazz and pop song perfect to enjoy on a Sunday morning. I do my Sunday dreaming, Oh yea! And all my Sunday scheming. Every minute, every hour, every day!

Rain On Me - Lady Gaga, Ariana Grande  https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=AoAm4om0wTs It's around 6 AM today in Jakarta and I got to admit that I just listen to it 1 hour ago, and I listen to it every single day since it came out. This song is different and new to me. Aside from amazing choreography, the lyrics itself have powerful message in it that the song not only energized me, but encouraging me, and it's really uplifting.  Lady Gaga and Ariana Grande also really personal making this song, as Lady Gaga stated in Apple Music interview: [1] “I remember thinking I had cried so many tears that it felt like an unfathomable downpour from my eyes. But even with that much rain, you don’t have to drown… Even though it feels like you are, you can still swim. And if there’s a strong current with a bunch of waves and they keep crashing over you, if you keep swimming, you’ll reach the center of the ocean, where it’s calm, still, and peaceful. She was so open to trying things that she hasn't done before. She was [like], 'I'm going to just trust you.' And it was this beautiful, I think, very healing process for me... That woman has been through some really tough, really hard life-testing stuff, undoubtedly… And then this friendship blossomed and this song 'Rain On Me,' the lyrics that I wrote right here in this studio, 'I'd rather be dry, but at least I'm alive. Rain on me.” Footnotes[1] https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=CZXBF9t32zA&t=2356s
